teams.name: Connecticut
teams.loan_because: As one of the richest states in one of the most prosperous nations, we choose to share what God has blessed us with.
teams.description: Connecticut is a small state in the Northeast part of the United States. We are made up of diverse people from all walks of life and care deeply about the human condition.

teams.name: España - Spain
teams.loan_because: Kiva ofrece un medio ideal para participar activamente en el apoyo a emprendedores sin recursos que no pueden acceder a los canales normales de financiación y que, gracias a los micro-créditos, pueden  desarrollar una actividad empresarial que les permita, a ellos y su entorno, alcanzar una mejor calidad de vida.
teams.description:
Este club se creó con la intención inicial de fomentar la participación de españolas y españoles en Kiva, no obstante,  está abierto a todas las personas que deseen unirse a él, sin importar su nacionalidad ni ninguna otra condición.
 
El único referente identitario de este grupo es la solidaridad y la convicción de que, a través de Kiva, es posible el apoyo a personas o grupos emprendedores que buscan y merecen una oportunidad por su esfuerzo.

teams.name: Yoga can help the world!
teams.loan_because: We care! Every person can make a difference, through selfless acts of kindness and generosity. We give with gratitude and unconditional love.
teams.description: This team is a part of a karma yoga project in which I offer yoga classes for donations and all the money gathered goes to provide loans for women with small businesses around the world.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

teams.name: yUUth
teams.loan_because: We believe in providing people with the needs to sustain themselves.
teams.description: We are a Unitarian Universalist youth group that believes and practices social justice and interconnectedness for all humans in the global community.

teams.name: Ambit Energy
teams.loan_because: We are able to give a hand up to entrepreneurs working towards better lives.
teams.description: Ambit Energy is a retail provider of residential electricity and gas services.  This group is open to Ambit Energy Customers and Consultants.

teams.name: 101 Cookbooks
teams.loan_because: There were nearly a million visits to 101 Cookbooks last month - a statistic that continues to amaze me. As the site has grown over the years, I kept thinking to myself that it would be great to figure out a way for us to affect change as a group - Kiva (with its team lending) is a great way for us to do that.
teams.description: Readers of Heidi Swanson's online recipe journal (blog) 101cookbooks.com

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Mendenhall Clan
teams.loan_because: There is a need

teams.name: Bloggers
teams.loan_because:
bloggers and their readers are generous people too. You don't have to run a blog to join the group. If you do run a blog, invite your readers/fans to join the group!

Just like blogs, our  money and support have no boundaries either.
teams.description: This group was created to bring together all types of Bloggers and their readers&fans who lend on Kiva.

teams.name: Team in Training
teams.description: Team in Training (TNT) raises funds for the Leukemia & Lymphoma Society to find a cure for blood cancers. Team in Training participants commit to raising money for LLS while training to complete an endurance event in honor of a special teammate who is fighting cancer.

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster
teams.loan_because:
"Thou shalt share, that none may seek without funding."   A nod to VII.  of “RANDOM NUMBER OF NOT COMMANDMENTS, SUGGESTIONS"  in the LOOSE CANON:
http://www.loose-canon.info/page17.htm
teams.description:
Members of the Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster  

Secular vs religious Field Partners, see links at http://atheist-monkey.blogspot.de/2009/08/kiva-mfi-checker.html

For Kiva tips and who knows what the FSM will move us to add for mutual benefit & merriment:  
http://flyingspaghettikivans.blogspot.it/    

and
  https://www.facebook.com/pages/FlyingSpaghettiKivans

teams.name: Crazy Canucks
teams.loan_because: We live in a well-to-do nation and want to help those less fortunate than ourselves
teams.description: We are CANADIAN !!!

teams.name: Kiva Team Germany
teams.loan_because: Showing interest in the life of others and giving a helping hand if needed is important.
teams.description: We are some fellows from Germany who believe in the concept of Kiva.

teams.name: Rhein-Kreis Neuss
teams.loan_because: Es ist eine sehr einfache, sehr günstige und doch sehr effiziente Möglichkeit Menschen in Entwicklungsländern zu unterstützen.
teams.description: Unser Team ist gedacht für alle KIVA-Freunde in Neuss, Grevenbroich, Meerbusch, Kaarst, Rommerskirchen, Dormagen, Jüchen und Korschenbroich. Werdet Mitglied und ladet eure Verwandten, Freunde und Nachbarn in dieses Team ein. Natürlich können auch alle ehemaligen Rhein-Kreis Neusser und Freunde des Rhein-Kreises Mitglied werden.

teams.name: Hemp Out
teams.loan_because: It’s in our nature, and it’s the right thing to do.
teams.description: We’re a kind group of lenders opposed to marijuana prohibition in the United States.  We feel pot should be decriminalized, taxed, and regulated much the same way alcohol is.  It’s our goal to recruit 420 members that aren’t afraid of a little weed in order to form a community of open-minded lenders that would like to “hemp out”.      Please visit www.norml.org to learn more about cannabis legalization. There’s nothing wrong with ganja; legalize bud!

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Volunteers of Tennessee
teams.loan_because: We wish to extend our southern hospitality worldwide!
teams.description: Simple people making a sacrifice so that others may live a more fulfilling life.

teams.name: Friendly Planet Travel
teams.loan_because: We would like the opportunity to give back to the different countries and locations where we send travelers.
teams.description: A team of caring travelers that would like to continue making a difference around the world.

teams.name: University of Michigan Alumni and Current Students
teams.loan_because: It's important to try to make a difference when and where you can.
teams.description: Kiva lenders with ties to the University of Michigan.

teams.name: Kiva Detroit
teams.loan_because: We want to champion small businesses in Detroit!
teams.description:
Kiva Detroit is the first Kiva City, a program where Kiva works with community organizations in the United States to provide local small businesses with microloans. 

The goal of the Kiva Detroit team is to empower Detroiters to champion local small businesses through Kiva. 

To double your impact, your loan to a Kiva Detroit borrower will be matched 1-to-1 by the Knight Foundation

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Team USA
teams.loan_because: We believe in the generosity of the human spirit that is still alive within Americans of all backgrounds.

teams.name: Quinnipiac University
teams.loan_because: We Care!
teams.description: Students, alumni, faculty, staff and friends of Quinnipiac University (College).

teams.name: New York University
teams.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.
teams.description: Although we are students and do not have much to give, we gladly give to our brothers and sisters across the globe whatever we can come up with. *Note: We are a group of students who attend NYU; the university is NOT affiliated with this program in any form or function*

teams.name: Team Virginia
teams.loan_because: We give new meaning to the phrase "Commonwealth of Virginia."  We Virginians are thrilled to pool our common resources to help entrepreneurs all over the world as they improve their lives and their communities.

From the Appalachian Mountains to Virginia Beach (and equally welcoming of members outside the state), we are enthusiastic Kiva lenders privileged to have ties to the great state of Virginia.

teams.name: Animal Lovers
teams.loan_because: Even as animals living in a developed country - we are better off  than humans in many parts of the world.
teams.description: We are animal lovers who want to help those less fortunate in the poor areas of the world.

teams.name: Kiva Minnesota
teams.description: Kiva lenders located in MN, USA

teams.name: Team Minneapolis/St. Paul
teams.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the lives of those in need.
teams.description: We are a team of Twin Cities residents concerned about world poverty. We host events around the city to raise money for Kiva loans, which we use to make new loans once the money is returned. We hope, as a community, to improve the plight of the impoverished by using microlending.

teams.name: Kiva Kiwis
teams.loan_because: Because Kiwis know what it is to pull yourself  up by your bootstraps.
teams.description: Started in Oamaru New Zealand by a group of friends wanting to encourage and to make it easy for Kiwis to make loans through Kiva.

teams.name: Kiva Kiwis
teams.loan_because: Because Kiwis know what it is to pull yourself  up by your bootstraps.
teams.description: Started in Oamaru New Zealand by a group of friends wanting to encourage and to make it easy for Kiwis to make loans through Kiva.

teams.name: Team California
teams.loan_because: Our state rules and we care about the world around us!
teams.description: We are from the great state of California!

teams.name: Writers, Artists and Composers
teams.loan_because: We understand the challenges faced by all creative entrepreneurs and especially  wish to assist and encourage initiatives in those parts of the world where financial hardships pose especially difficult obstacles to success.
teams.description: We are novelists, poets, screenwriters, playwrights, music makers, filmmakers, sculptors, painters and all other practitioners of the literary, musical and plastic arts.

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: Sowing Circle
teams.loan_because:
"Money is the seed of money, and the first franc is sometimes more difficult to acquire than the second million."
 Jean-Jacques Rousseau
teams.description: We are connected by friendship, family relationship, and a desire to help make the world a better place. Everyone needs a bit of help from time to time, and Kiva has created a wonderful way to link us with each other.

teams.name: KivaFriends.org
teams.loan_because: we are a diverse group of people with diverse reasons for participating on Kiva.org, but with a unifying desire to alleviate poverty around the world through making microloans to the hard working poor.
teams.description: We are a community for lenders by lenders. We welcome Kiva.org lenders to participate in our lender forums at KivaFriends.org

teams.name: Ars Technica
teams.loan_because: It's kind of fun.
teams.description: We're all members of the Ars Technica community.  We're basically tech nerds.

teams.name: Nanofinance Alliance
teams.loan_because: Every single one of us realizes we had to depend on someone to give us a start, a hope, or a chance. Whether that help from our parents, family, neighbors, or friends we realized it is our turn to pass on the blessings we have been given.
teams.description: We're a group of friends with a pragmatic, open-minded, and easygoing attitude who most importantly share the same sense of humor that allows us to focus on the positive things in the world.

teams.name: University of Miami
teams.description: Alumni, students, faculty, and friends of the University of Miami

teams.name: Beacon Heights COB
teams.loan_because: At Beacon Heights, we believe Jesus Christ calls and empowers us to be servants in our community and world. We want to share in word and deed the Good News of God's love and care for all people.
teams.description: Our church is committed to working for peace in our city, nation and world.

teams.name: Washington State
teams.loan_because: Each of us has a responsibility to all of us.

teams.name: G.A.S. Gruppo di Acquisto Solidale di Macerata
teams.description: Il Gruppo di Acquisto Solidale (GAS), di Macerata (MC) è stato costituito il 19 novembre 2006, a seguito dell’assemblea, svoltasi presso Sala Circolo ANCOL, Via Marche, 84 (Macerata). Le persone hanno manifestato la volontà di formare il gruppo GasMc, compilando il modulo, del volantino per l’assemblea costituente , utilizzato per la convocazione dell’incontro. Sono iscritti al gruppo 94 referenti di diversi nuclei familiari, per un totale complessivo di circa 200/250 persone coinvolte.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Kids for Kiva
teams.loan_because: We are trying to learn about the world around us and how to be a part of making it the best place possible.  As one of my students stated, "Kiva is the real thing, not just made up stuff in books."  The kids are incredibly excited to make loans and they are empowered by the experience.
teams.description: We are team of elementary students that is looking to for other students around the world to join our team.  We want to show how much kids can make a difference in the world.

teams.name: KivaKids
teams.loan_because: We think kids can help people to help themselves.
teams.description: We make bracelets and other jewelry out of beads, and sell them to other kids.  We donate our profits people through Kiva.

teams.name: Sunwood Kiva
teams.loan_because: It's better than C-mas gifts
teams.description: The group of Envision Credit Union's Coquitlam branch.

teams.name: India
teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave
teams.description:
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty.

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

Funding loans from India: http://www.kiva.org/lend?countries=IN

http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva/2012/08/15/kiva-launches-in-india.html

teams.name: Build India
teams.loan_because: We want to make a difference to Power Rural India.
teams.description:
We are committed to bring prosperity to rural India as we believe that insufficient resources to make a decent living in villages is the reason that most of our villagers migrate to cities aggravating the problems of already crowded cities. We aim to develop sustainable infrastructure in villages to improve the quality of life for people in Rural India.

We are currently interested in collaborating with individuals and companies interested in expanding the concept of integrating microfinance with renewable power generation to finance utility scale solar and wind power projects in India in association with KIVA

teams.name: Nashville
teams.loan_because: We care about the success and development of ALL people throughout the world, not just at home.
teams.description: Current or past Nashville residents coming together to make a difference globally.

teams.name: Green Partnerships
teams.loan_because: We want to help create more sustainable and equitable communities all around the world.
teams.description:
We lend to individuals and groups engaged in businesses and services that help them earn a living but also help to protect the environment in their part of the world. We also strive to build green partnerships in our own communities by supporting the women and men who provide businesses, services, and products that benefit people and the Earth. 

Some of our team members mainly fund green loans, while others choose to designate a fraction of their loans to green enterprises. These are examples of just some of the loans Green Partnerships has helped to fund:

teams.name: iPeace
teams.loan_because: We care and we can
teams.description:
Sharing Peace, Making A Difference. 

iPeace is not an organization. It's an organism. It's alive, and it's made out of people; It is made from you, her him, them, us and me. It is not for profit and it is not for prestige. It is for peace. Period.


iPeace is a wiki-organism that believes in unity, sharing and love. iPeace believes in the tremendous power of people, when united together, to make a true change in the world.


Sharing Peace. Making A Difference. If each one of us makes the pledge to reduce pain in out world just by a little bit, our impact will be tremendous. Fight poverty, violence, hunger or prejudice. Help our children get better education or do something for our planet. The aggregate of the little changes will make our world more peaceful.


iPeace will be a hub to ALL peace initiatives in the world. You'll be able to come here and educate yourself about what's going on and where, and also share YOUR knowledge. We will cooperate and give support to all peace initiatives, as long as they are non violent and non profit.

teams.name: Cheeseheads For Change
teams.loan_because: If you give a man a fish, you feed him for a day.  Now in the modern world, you can give that same man a loan to buy a fishing pole, he catches fish with his new pole to feed his family, his community improves because of his financial success, he pays the loan back, and  you can re-loan that money again to help someone else buy a fishing pole . . . wait, that sounds like a conspiracy by the Rapala Corporation to sell more fishing equipment, what are we supporting here ;-)
teams.description: Our Kiva lending team is a non-political group consisting of Green Bay Packers fans lovingly known as Cheeseheads, and anyone who lives in or has ties to the great state of Wisconsin and is interested in making the world a better place.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142

teams.name: Humanist
teams.loan_because: It takes people to help people.  We believe in good.
teams.description:
Humanists strive to live good and ethical lives, with no belief in the supernatural.  We give meaning and purpose to our lives through reason, compassion and action.

Most Atheists and non-religious people ARE Humanists, but don't realize it!

Our team helps the poor, builds the Humanist community and shows that non-religious people give, care and share.

We are endorsed by the American Humanist Association, British Humanist Association and International Humanist and Ethical Union.

teams.name: 65th Street Change Gang
teams.loan_because: We seek to promote change through community service.  We recognize that our community is part of the rest of the world
teams.description: The 65th Street Change Gang is a neighborhood manifestation of hope and change.  Our members, who live primarily in north Seattle, Washington, many on or near NE 65th Street, are a diverse, bipartisan group of many ages and backgrounds, who have been inspired to come together to promote change.  Anyone anywhere who wants to help change the lives of those less fortunate is welcome to join the lending team.

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: Indiana
teams.loan_because: We believe people around the world are connected and we can make a positive difference in others' lives.
teams.description:
Indiana is the 19th U.S. state and is located in the Midwest region of the United States of America. With over six million residents, it is ranked 15th in population and 17th in population density.

Indiana is a diverse state with a few large urban areas and a number of smaller industrial cities. It is best known for the Indianapolis 500 American automobile race, held annually over the Memorial Day weekend, and a strong basketball tradition, often called Hoosier Hysteria. Residents of Indiana are called Hoosiers. The state's name means "Land of the Indians."

Check out the distribution of our team's impact around the world: 
http://kivafolio.appspot.com/report?user=indiana

To see a map showing where Indiana team members are located, click the link below.

teams.name: HIghland Elementary School
teams.description: Elementary School K-5
